original_title: She's Working Her Way Through College
overview: Shapely burlesque dancer Hot Garters Gertie aka Angela Gardner meets her future drama professor. Her new landlady proves to be the professor's wife. Angela helps breath life into the annual school stage show...but someone has discovered her secret past.
tagline: She's a Burlesque Queen who becomes a co-ed--and gives the Student Body a brand new twist!
title: She's Working Her Way Through College
